text_block_list.text: ――A day off. I was planning on buying a book for training, and then keeping the rest of the day casual……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer-san. Hello~ ……Back from the bookstore?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Oh~…… I can't read the title because it's got so many difficult kanji. Something something, priority…… -metry-……?
choice_data_list: A book we can use for training

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: I see. ……Even thinking about training on your day off, as usual you're quite enthusiastic, huh?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Hmmmm~. It's something for me…… wouldn't it be better for me to tag along? Doesn't feel right to just leave with a 『Good Work』)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, where are you heading next? Got some more shopping to do?
I hadn't really decided on anything yet but, I told her I was thinking about seeing a movie or doing some karaoke.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Eh, so normal……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah, ahaha. No, I didn't mean that in a bad way. I see, I see. Then~…… how about going together?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: I happen to have some free time. So will you let me go with you?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Haaa~. Really, being able to let loose like that feels good~. We have lessons for our Lives too but, I guess karaoke feels a bit different.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Don't ask something so obvious~! Of course I'd be nervous! Every single time, I'm always quaking in my boots.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: And if I were to mess up, it'd cause trouble for everyone else~. My voice is so shaky too. And when everyone around me is so perfect, I get even more nervous~.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: On top of that, the stage is a really special place, isn't it? It's not an atmosphere you'd be in normally……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Of course, there's also fun and interesting parts, but the nerves are no joke~. Just thinking about it gets my heart pumping……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: That's how it is! Trainer-san, you should try standing there sometime――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……Oh, it's the next song. I've been practicing this song――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Wai-!? W-what are you doing all of a sudden? Ah, are you cheering!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: No, that's not really a cheer though!? Ahaa, ahahaha! Stop it! I can't sing if you're making me laugh~!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Huuuuu～～～…… That one just now, was probably the best song so far, don't you think?
choice_data_list: You're so good! I wanna hear more!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Don't just make me do it, Trainer-san you should sing too!
choice_data_list: A cheer song for Hishi Miracle……!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah…… wait, there's no way there's a song like that――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: You're just gonna sing acapella!? Ahahahaa, c'mon, stop that!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Haa-…… that was fun……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: What, why are you the one with the self-satisfied smirk on your face~? Halfway through, I was just laughing, you know.
choice_data_list: Sorry, I was just having fun……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Well~ I did think you were letting it go to your head though~.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (……But, it didn't really bother me though. I can tell they mean it when they're praising me, I guess)
choice_data_list: All that singing made me hungry

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah. Same here~. How about heading to a family restaurant?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah, a poster about the kid's meal…… Do you ever feel like just getting one sometimes? A kid's meal I mean.

text_block_list.name: Hishi MiracleHishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Right~? I wonder why that is. And then there's something you just have to get if you come to a family restaurant――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Right, right. Anyways, getting fries is a must. Trainer-san, what about you?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Something you always have to order……ah, or maybe some kind of weird mix you make with your drink?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Well, let's see~. Now I don't do it but, a loooo~ng time ago, what my friends and I used to do――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Huuu~. We ended up eating quite a lot, huh? Ate alot, and talked alot……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: It almost felt like when I'm with my friends, I guess……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: No, nothing. It's just that…… I thought Trainer-san would feel more like a teacher.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Like I would get nervous while talking to you, or feel some kind of distance…… kinda like between an adult and a kid. Something like that.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: But, I really don't get that feeling from Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah, that it helps. It makes things easier. And I don't feel like I have to think too hard about it.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……but well, it feels more like you're the one being considerate of me, so that might be why it's easier.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Nothing. It's probably about time we head back. I laughed a bit too much today, so I'll probably get a good night's sleep.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (…… normally, this is how most days go. But when there's a race, I really can feel the difference in passion, huh?)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (I want to do my best to live up to expectations, and I'm working hard but…… I wonder what Trainer-san thinks about that difference)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Even if I can't match that passion, I do want to close that gap, even if just a little though~. Hmmm, maybe some kind of gratitude for being so passionate?)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (No, no, that would feel kind of weird. Not like that, maybe something more……)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Maybe some kind of present……? No, would something like that be weird~? They'd be like 『But, why?』 huh?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm~, mmmmm~…… it's so hard~……
Hishi Miracle was beside me mumbling to herself. I wonder if something's wrong. I'd like it if she wouldn't hesitate to consult me……
From what I could hear, maybe she's worried about gifts for her friends.
Then I guess I don't need to worry too much. While gazing at the sunset, I matched my pace with Hishi Miracle as we headed back.
